Verses: 1 karththar Moseyai Nokki:

2 pinnum Nee Isravel Puththirarode Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Isravel Puththirarilum Isravelil Vaasampannugira Anniyargalilum Evanaagilum Than Sandhadhiyil Oru Pillaiyai Molegukkuk Koduththaal, Avan Kolai Seyyappadavendum; Dhesaththin Janangal Avanmel Kalleriyavendum.

3 avan En Parisuththa Sthalaththaith Theettuppaduththi, En Parisuththa Naamaththaip Parisuththak Kulaichchalaakkumpadikku, Than Sandhadhiyil Oru Pillaiyai Molegukkuk Koduththadhinaale, Naan Appadippattavanukku Virodhamaaga Edhirththu Nindru Avanaith Than Janaththil Iraadhapadikku Aruppundu Pogappannuven.
4 avan Than Sandhadhiyil Oru Pillaiyai Molegukkuk Kodukkumpodhu, Dhesaththin Janangal Avanaik Kolaiseyyaadhapadikkuk Kansaadaiyaayirundhaal,

5 naan Andha Manidhanukkum Avan Kudumbaththukkum Virodhamaaga Edhirththu Nindru , Avanaiyum, Avan Pirage Molegai Vibasaaramaarkkamaaip Pinpatrina Yaavaraiyum, Thangal Janaththil Iraadhapadikku Aruppundupogappannuven.

6 anjanam Paarkkiravargalaiyum, Kurisollugiravargalaiyum, Pinthodarndhu Sorampoga Endha Aaththumaa Avargalai Naadugiraano, Andha Aaththumaavukku Virodhamaaga Edhirththunindru, Avanaith Than Janaththiliraadhapadikku Aruppundupogappannuven.
7 aadhalaal Neengal Ungalaip Parisuththappaduththip Parisuththaraayirungal; Naan Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar.
8 en Kattalaigalaik Kaikkondu Nadavungal; Naan Ungalaip Parisuththamaakkugira Karththar.
9 than Thagappanaiyaavadhu Than Thaayaiyaavadhu Sabikkira Evanum Kolaiseyyappadakkadavan; Avan Than Thagappanaiyum Than Thaayaiyum Sabiththaan, Avan Raththappazhi Avanmel IruppadhaagaÂ .
10 oruvan Piranudaiya Manaiviyode Vibasaaram Seydhaal, Piran Manaiviyode Vibasaaram Seydha Andha Vibasaaranum Andha Vibasaariyum Kolaiseyyappadakkadavargal.
11 than Thagappan Manaiviyode Sayanikkiravan Than Thagappanai Nirvaanamaakkinapadiyaal, Iruvarum Kolaiseyyappadakkadavargal; Avargal Raththappazhi Avargalmel Iruppadhaaga.
12 oruvan Than Marumagalode Sayaniththaal, Iruvarum Kolai Seyyappadakkadavargal; Aruvaruppaana Thaarumaaru Panninaargal; Avargal Raththappazhi Avargalmel Iruppadhaaga.
13 oruvan Pennode Samyogampannugiradhupola Aanode Samyogampanninaal, Aruvaruppaanakaariyam Seydha Avviruvarum Kolai Seyyappadakkadavargal; Avargal Raththappazhi Avargalmel Iruppadhaaga.
14 oruvan Oru Sthreeyaiyum Aval Thaayaiyum Padaiththaal, Adhu Muraikedu; Ivvidhamuraikedu Ungalukkul Iraadhapadikku, Avanaiyum Avargalaiyum Akkiniyil Sutterikkavendum.
15 oruvan Mirugaththode Punarndhaal, Avan Kolaiseyyappadakkadavan; Andha Mirugaththaiyum Kollakkadaveergal.

16 oru Sthree Yaadhoru Mirugaththode Serndhu Sayaniththaal, Andha Sthreeyaiyum Andha Mirugaththaiyum Kollakkadavaai; Iru Jeevanum Kolaiseyyappadavendum; Avaigalin Raththappazhi Avaigalinmel Iruppadhaaga.

17 oruvan Than Thagappanukkaavadhu Than Thaaikkaavadhu Kumaaraththiyaayirukkira Than Sagodhariyai Serththukkondu, Avan Avaludaiya Nirvaanaththaiyum, Aval Avanudaiya Nirvaanaththaiyum Paarththaal Adhu Paadhagam; Avargal Thangal Janangalin Kangalukku Munbaaga Aruppundu Pogakkadavargal; Avan Than Sagodhariyai Nirvaanappaduththinaan; Avan Than Akkiramaththai Sumappaan.
18 oruvan Soodhaga Sthreeyode Sayaniththu, Avalai Nirvaanamaakkinaal, Avan Avaludaiya Udhira Ootrai Velippaduththinapadiyaal, Iruvarum Thangal Janaththil Iraadhapadikku Aruppundupogavendum.
19 un Thaayinudaiya Sagodhariyaiyum Un Thagappanudaiya Sagodhariyaiyum Nirvaanamaakkaayaaga, Appadippattavan Than Nerungiya Inaththai Avamaanamaakkinaan; Avargal Thangal Akkiramaththai Sumappaargal.
20 oruvan Than Thagappanin Sagodharanudaiya Manaiviyode Sayaniththaal, Avan Than Thagappanin Sagodharanai Nirvaanamaakkinaan; Avargal Thangal Paavaththai Sumappaargal, Sandhaanamillaamal Saavaargal.
21 oruvan Than Sagodharan Manaiviyai Vivaagampanninaal, Adhu Asuththam; Than Sagodharanai Nirvaanamaakkinaan, Avargal Sandhaanamatriruppaargal.
22 aagaiyaal Neengal Kudiyiruppadharkaaga Naan Ungalaik Kondupogira Dhesam Ungalaik Kakkikpodaadhapadikku, Neengal En Kattalaigal Yaavaiyum Ennudaiya Nyaayangal Yaavaiyum Kaikkondu Nadavungal.
23 naan Ungalukku Munbaagath Thuraththividugira Janaththinudaiya Vazhipaadugalil Nadavaadhirungal; Avargal Ippadippatta Kaariyangalaiyellaam Seydhapadiyaal Naan Avargalai Arosiththen.

24 neengal Avargal Dhesaththai Sudhandharippeergal Endru Ungalode Sonnen; Paalum Thenum Odugira Andha Dhesaththai Ungalukku Sudhandharamaagak Koduppen; Ungalai Matra Janangalai Vittup Piriththeduththa Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Naane.

25 aagaiyaal Suththamaana Mirugangalukkum Asuththamaana Mirugangalukkum, Suththamaana Paravaigalukkum Asuththamaana Paravaigalukkum Neengal Viththiyaasam Panni, Naan Ungalukkuth Theettaaga Enna Solli Vilakkina Mirugangalaalum Paravaigalaalum Tharaiyile Oorugira Yaadhoru Praanigalaalum Ungalai Aruvaruppaakkaadhiruppeergalaaga.

26 karththaraagiya Naan Parisuththaraayirukkirapadiyinaale Neengalum Enakketra Parisuththavaangalaayiruppeergalaaga, Neengal Ennudaiyavargalaayirukkumpadikku, Ungalai Matra Janangalai Vittup Piriththeduththen.

27 anjanampaarkkiravargalum Kurisollugiravargalumaayirukkira Purushanaagilum Sthreeyaagilum Kolaiseyyappadavendum; Avargalmel Kallerivaargalaaga; Avargal Raththappazhi Avargalmel Irukkakkadavadhu Endru Sol Endraar.
